snippet: The retail giant will carry Wild Oats products that will undercut brand-name organic competitors by at least 25 percent.
abstract: Walmart plans to announce that it is putting its muscle behind Wild Oats organic products, owned by Yucaipa Companies, offering the label at prices that will undercut brand-name organic competitors by at least 25 percent; move is likely to send shock waves through the organic market.

byline.original: By ELIZABETH A. HARRIS and STEPHANIE STROM

lead_paragraph: The retail giant will carry Wild Oats products that will undercut brand-name organic competitors by at least 25 percent.

headline.main: Walmart to Sell Organic Food, Undercutting Big Brands
headline.print_headline: Walmart to Offer Organic Line of Food at Discount Prices
